{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Iron Ball |image = [[File:Iron_Ball_Updated.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Irom Ball''. |value = 2 {{Diamonds}} |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Rare Hold Items]] |helditem =
*[[File:Mawile.png|30px]]Mawile }} ==Description== The '''Iron Ball''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Iron Ball has a value of 2 [[Diamonds]] {{Diamonds}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Mine Layout== The Iron Ball appears in the Underground as a 3x3 sized object.

[[File:IronBallMine.png|100px]] ==Acquisition== Iron Balls can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as [[Rare Hold Items]] from [[File:Mawile.png|30px]] Mawile.
{{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]]
